line.text: O for my sake do you with Fortune chide
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: The guilty goddess of my harmful deeds
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: That did not better for my life provide
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Than public means which public manners breeds
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Thence comes it that my name receives a brand
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And almost thence my nature is subdued
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: To what it works in like the dyer hand
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Pity me then and wish I were renewed
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Whilst like a willing patient I will drink
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Potions of eisel gainst my strong infection
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: No bitterness that I will bitter think
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Nor double penance to correct correction
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Pity me then dear friend and I assure ye
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Even that your pity is enough to cure me
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
